column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This pizza is good if you don't like flavor. I mean bland! Tried the Lou and a pepperoni. I was blown away by Labriola last time I was in Chicago
column2: so I couldn't wait to try the restaurant that seems to be at the top of all the best lists. Might be just me
column3: but this was as bland and flavorless as could be
column4: and the deep dish crust is just Plain undercooked and boring.
